title: When I hit 30 I'm going to play just one champion in ranked
body:
So I've read about the game, watched videos and the sort. I'm going to just main one champion in ranked because it seems pretty cool.

Suggestions?

replies.body:
This is literally impossible. You will need some alternate picks in case your first choice gets banned.

On the other hand, I approve of the idea, if you can get it to work. You'll want to pick someone who can be played in as many roles as possible: Top, Jungler/2nd Top, Mid, ADC, Support/Tank.

Not impossible. Some champions never get banned,

{{champion:83}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:6}}

janna

she will always be strong so you don't need to worry about nerfs
and support isn't exactly a popular role

Not sure what you're looking for suggestions for, but if you're trying to find the right champion, I'd be looking for one who is able to play multiple roles. There's a pretty decent chance that you won't be able to get your #1 role in all of your games. You'll also want at least 3 solid backups incase of a freakish ban-out problem!  

What's your strongest role at the moment? Without knowing that, here's a few good multi-role champions (focusing on 3+ roles) and their roles:
- Lulu (Top, Mid, Support, and surprisingly, not a terrible marksman. I haven't tried her in the S5 Jungle, but was feasible in S4)
- Kayle (Top, Mid, Jungle, Support [not so great anymore], passable in a Marksman role)
- Morgana (Top, Mid, Support, and a feasible Jungler)
- Jarvan (Top, Jungle, Mid, not such a good support since the armour removal on flag)
- Jayce (Top, Mid, ADC)
- Riven (Top, Mid, Jungle)
- Lissandra (Top, Mid, passable support)
- Fizz (Top, Mid, Jungle)
- Nidalee (Top, Mid, Jungle)

Don't main a champ just because someone well known makes her look good. Play ALL the champs and find one that just...clicks.
Every ADC has the potential to carry if played well.
That being said, Vayne is incredibly fun and an absolute pain in the arse to deal with if they're good.
I main her now. And yes she is very fun. Get easily counter picked but she is so strong lategame.

I don't like meta champions I just like inbetween champions that have potential to be good if played well. 

Also I like carry roles and champions that can carry yoloQ.

What Role do you play?
What type do you play?
Do you like mobility over tank?
Do you want to carry or help someone else carry?
Are you a meta-follower or do you think outside the box?
Are you sure you can keep to one champion for as long as it takes to climb to a decent rating? (Can take thousands of games)
If you can answer that then you will have a pretty decent champion pool to sort through to find your main.

Now here's the kicker. Its not that great to ONLY play one champion. If your champ gets picked/banned or you're up against a hard counter (lets say you pick Irelia into Olaf) you are going to get destroyed. Of course there's the reasoning that if you master your champion, then hard counters dont mean anything, but since your not even level 30 yet i don't think your at that stage. 

If you take my advice and go for a champion pool instead of only one champion, you might want to sort your %%%% out like I did:
4 Champs for your main role, focusing on 1 more then the others.
At least 2 champs for every other role.
If you did go 2 champs for every other role try to do this:
For Top take a Tank and an Assassin
For mid lane take both an AD and an AP caster
For jungle take both a Tank and an Assassin
For ADC take a High Mobility/Low damage carry and a Low Mobility/High damage carry
For support take a Tank and a Squishy
For your main role (we'll use my main role Top as an example) take 2 tanks and two assassins. Make one of each two groups AP and the others AD.

But that's just like, my opinion man.
